mil7.4.9:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘sakkassa tini angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani tini angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.4.9:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena ekantapavivekasukhabhiratena bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.9:1.4: Idam, maharaja, sakkassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.9:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, sakko deve disva pagganhati, hasamabhijaneti;
mil7.4.9:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena kusalesu dhammesu alinamatanditam santam manasam paggahetabbam, hasamabhijanetabbam, utthahitabbam ghatitabbam vayamitabbam.
mil7.4.9:2.3: Idam, maharaja, sakkassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.9:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, sakkassa anabhirati nuppajjati;
mil7.4.9:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sunnagare anabhirati na uppadetabba.
mil7.4.9:3.3: Idam, maharaja, sakkassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
